moves.1. e4 c5 2. b4 cxb4 3. a3 bxa3 4. Nf3: The Sicilian Wing Gambit.  White gives up a pawn for quicker development and a stronger center.
moves.4... e6 5. e5 Bc5 6. d4 Bb4+ 7. c3 Be7: ??? It's like I got 3 free moves.  My  pawns have taken the center and his bishop was moved 3 times.
moves.8. Bxa3 Bxa3 9. Nxa3: Aiming for d6.  Will he let me take it?
moves.10... Ke7: ???  His King has to move anyway so he just gets it over with.
moves.11. Qd2 a6 12. Nd6 b5 13. Bd3 f6 14. Bxb: Taking the bishop will cost him his rook.
Now to go in for the kill...
moves.18. Qg5+ Kf8 19. Qf4+: 19. ..., Nf6 would have stopped mate for a few moves...
